title: Petition to be able to type "Brad" into the champion selects search bar and have Bard come up
body: Brad is such a cool kid name.

replies.body: it works if you have dislexia
Don't forget him and other avian champions coming up when typing "bird"
Brad, Bard, Bird, Beard, Berd. His name is messed up on purpose for fun! I never said he was a bird...
but what if i was tryin to type Brand...
Then you make a meme thread for misspelling Brand! Go forth and do it!
